mutants.code:
def count_subarrays_with_length_as_element(test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        (N, A) = case
        x = N - 1
        ans = [[-1] for _ in range(x)]
        for i in range(N):
            ans[A[i]] += [i]
        total_subarrays = N * x // 2
        for i in range(1, x):
            ans[i] += [N]
            total_subarrays -= sum((max(0, ans[i][j + 1] - ans[i][j] - i) for j in range(len(ans[i]) - 1)))
        results.append(total_subarrays)
    return results

def count_subarrays_with_length_as_element(test_cases):
    results = []

        (N, A) = case
        x = N + 1
        ans = [[-1] for _ in range(x)]

            total_subarrays -= sum((max(0, ans[i][j + -1] - ans[i][j] - i) for j in range(len(ans[i]) - 1)))
